text:
A problem with 1.2RC2 during startup

Use SHUTDOWN to close normally. Use [Ctrl]+[C] to abort abruptly
Wed Feb 11 21:36:13 CET 2004 Listening for connections ...
log4j:ERROR setFile(null,true) call failed.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
The path to log4j.log is set in this file:
build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/log4j.properties

For the binary-version that file contains the line
log4j.appender.A1.File=${log-directory}/log4j.log

log-directory does not seem to be set anywhere.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 26114 ***
